{"id":959443030,"question_id":2801,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1685346596,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/959443030/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Difference of Number of Distinct Values on Diagonals","memory":"44.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[][] differenceOfDistinctValues(int[][] grid) {\n        \n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n        \n        int[][] ans = new int[h][w];\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n            \n            for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n                \n                ans[i][j] = checkDia(grid, i, j);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n    \n    \n    private int checkDia(int[][] grid, int i, int j){\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n        \n        \n        HashSet<Integer> topLeft = new HashSet<>();\n        HashSet<Integer> rightBottom = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        int left=j-1;\n        int top=i-1;\n        while(left>=0 && top>=0){\n            topLeft.add(grid[top--][left--]);\n        }\n        \n        int right = j+1;\n        int bottom = i+1;\n        while(right<w && bottom<h){\n            rightBottom.add(grid[bottom++][right++]);\n        }\n        \n        return Math.abs(topLeft.size()-rightBottom.size());\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"difference-of-number-of-distinct-values-on-diagonals","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
